titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the temporary increase in unemployment tax.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the temporary increase in unemployment tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish a permanent 6.0% tax rate on wages paid to employees under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act (FICA).
